com.alexkasko.springjdbc.parallel
Interface ParallelQueriesExceptionHandler

public interface ParallelQueriesExceptionHandler

Exception handler for exceptions propagated from worker threads to caller thread.

Author:
alexkasko Date: 1/29/13

Method Summary
 void handle(ParallelQueriesException e)
          If implementation rethrow exception (of throw another exception) workers execution will be cancelled and exception will be propagated to Iterator.next() or Iterator.hasNext() call.
 

Method Detail

handle

void handle(ParallelQueriesException e)
            throws RuntimeException
If implementation rethrow exception (of throw another exception) workers execution will be cancelled and exception will be propagated to Iterator.next() or Iterator.hasNext() call. Will be called from the iterator caller thread on worker exception.

Parameters:
e - worker exception wrapped into ParallelQueriesException
Throws:
RuntimeException - rethrow or throw new exception to cancel workers execution
